snippet: Seattle will pay $45,000 to a woman whom the police shocked with a stun gun after stopping her for speeding when she was seven months pregnant.
abstract: City of Seattle reaches $45,000 settlement with Malaika Brooks, woman whom police shocked with a stun gun after stopping her for speeding when she was seven months pregnant; settlement resolves legal dispute in city that is under federal scrutiny over allegations of harsh and biased policing.
lead_paragraph: Seattle will pay $45,000 to a woman whom the police shocked with a stun gun after stopping her for speeding when she was seven months pregnant.

headline.main: Washington: $45,000 Settlement in Suit Over Shocking of a Pregnant Woman
headline.print_headline: Washington: $45,000 Settlement in Suit Over Shocking of a Pregnant Woman
